channel.title: If you Can Read this
channel.description:
Congratulations!
You may now post a thread in here to be moved to the SCAR Script Sales Board, since i have verified your script.
Remember to Include:
[ul][*]The Price in GP / USD / GPB etc in this format: [Price here] [*]The Full Name of your Script [*]Which RS it is for (Although its most probably gonna be RS2) in this format: [RS2] [*]Contact Information! [*]Includes it Uses[/ul]
An Example of the Title: [RS2][1Mill][7 GBP] Starblaster100's Ess Miner
As soon as you have posted the thread, and i've checked it over, ill move it for you. No need to post the script again, ive already seen it.
Thanks, and good luck selling
Star

item.title: If you Can Read this
item.dc:creator: @Starblaster100 Starblaster100
item.description:
@Starblaster100 wrote:

Congratulations!

You may now post a thread in here to be moved to the SCAR Script Sales Board, since i have verified your script.

Remember to Include:

[ul][]The Price in GP / USD / GPB etc in this format: [Price here]
[]The Full Name of your Script
[]Which RS it is for (Although its most probably gonna be RS2) in this format: [RS2]
[]Contact Information!
[*]Includes it Uses[/ul]

An Example of the Title:
[RS2][1Mill][7 GBP] Starblaster100’s Ess Miner

As soon as you have posted the thread, and i’ve checked it over, ill move it for you.
No need to post the script again, ive already seen it.

Thanks, and good luck selling

Star
